name: Morbid - Demo (Work in progress)
description:
*Disclaimer: Morbid is a student project built by a team of 10 with 1 artist and 1 programmer in 9 months of classes together. Many Assets are from the asset store. In no way is this a commercial/professional product as it is only meant to showcase our abilities as student developers. *

Morbid is a 3D 3rd Person Puzzle Adventure Game Demo where the player takes the role of Jeff, a successful architect who has just come home from a business trip to find that his mansion has been overtaken by a cult and his infant son has gone missing. 

Jeff will have to explore the various rooms of the mansion, solve puzzles , search for clues which will help piece together the answers towards the disappearance of his son. 

While the story progresses, Jeff will learn how to perform magic rituals that need to be fueled by energy drawn from the underworld through rifts that are scattered throughout the mansion.

This rituals will serve him as keys to solve puzzles as well as weapons to fight the cult members and their leader.
